# Tidy Tuesday contributions  

These are my contributions to [#TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) which is a weekly social data project. I share my contributions on [Fosstodon](https://fosstodon.org/@gabbspalomo), [X or Twitter](https://twitter.com/gabbspalomo), and [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/gabspalomo.bsky.social). Feedback is always welcome! And if you find my code useful, please either fork my repo or let me know.
